data.name: Sample - Qualys - 1.0.1
data.description: Sample playbook collection for Qualys to perform operations like launch vulnerability scan, launch patch/map/remediation/compliance report, manage policy compliance scan, manage virtual host etc.

workflows.name: Get Report Template List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of all report templates present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud.

routes.name: Get Report Template List -> Save Response

workflows.name: Get Host Detection List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of and details hosts including the hosts latest vulnerability data from Qualys, based on the automatic data available in user's account and other input parameters you have specified.

routes.name: Get Host Detection List -> Save Response

workflows.name: Get Asset Group List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of asset groups from Qualys based on the input parameters (filters) you have specified.

routes.name: Get Asset Group List -> Save Response

workflows.name: Get Report List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of reports from the user's report share on the Qualys cloud.

workflows.name: Delete Report
workflows.description: Deletes a saved report from the user's account on the Qualys cloud, based on the report ID you have specified.

workflows.name: Download Saved Report
workflows.description: Download a saved report in the userâ€™s account

workflows.name: Launch Scheduled Report
workflows.description: Launch a scheduled report with given ID

workflows.name: Launch Scan Based Findings Report
workflows.description: Launch scan based finding reports in user's account

arguments.title: Qualys: Launch Scan Based Findings Report

routes.name: Launch Scan Based Findings Report -> Save Response
Alert -> Launch Scan Based Findings Report

workflows.name: Launch Host Based Findings Report
workflows.description: Launch Host Based Findings reports in user's account

arguments.title: Qualys: Launch Host Based Findings Report

routes.name: Launch Host Based Findings Report -> Save Response
Alerts -> Launch Host Based Findings Report

workflows.name: Get Virtual Host List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of virtual hosts in the user account based on the filter

routes.name: Get Virtual Host List -> Save Response

workflows.name: Manage Virtual Host
workflows.description: Manages a virtual host on the Qualys cloud, based on the IP addresses, actions, and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Manage Excluded Host
workflows.description: Manages an excluded host on the Qualys cloud, based on the IP addresses, actions, and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Scheduled Report List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of scheduled reports from the user's report share on the Qualys cloud.

routes.name: Get Scheduled Report List -> Save Repsonse

workflows.name: Get Schedule Scan List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of all scheduled scans present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific scheduled scans based on the input parameters you have specified.

routes.name: Get Schedule Scan List -> Save Response

workflows.name: Launch Remediation Report
workflows.description: Launch remediation report in user's account

workflows.name: Launch Compliance Report
workflows.description: Launch compliance report in user's account

workflows.name: Launch Patch Report
workflows.description: Launch patch report in user's account

workflows.name: PC - Manage Scan
workflows.description: Manages a vulnerability management scan on the Qualys cloud, based on the scan reference and actions you have specified.

workflows.name: PC - Launch Scan
workflows.description: Launches compliance scans in the userâ€™s account on the Qualys cloud, based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: VM - Fetch Scan
workflows.description: Downloads all the vulnerability management scan results from the Qualys cloud, or specific vulnerability management scan results based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Add Assets
workflows.description: Adds assets, i.e., IP addresses, to the subscription on the Qualys cloud, based on the IP addresses and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Asset List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of all IP addresses that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific IP addresses based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: VM - Launch Scan
workflows.description: Launches vulnerability scans in the userâ€™s account on the Qualys cloud, based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Option Profiles
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of available option profiles from the user's account on the Qualys cloud.

workflows.name: Get Excluded Host List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of all excluded hosts that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific excluded hosts based on the input parameters you have specified.

routes.name: Get Excluded Hosts List -> Save Response

workflows.name: Launch Scorecard
workflows.description: Launch a vulnerability score card report in the userâ€™s Report Share

workflows.name: Launch Compliance  Policy Report
workflows.description: Launch policy compliance report in user's account

workflows.name: Get Scanned Host List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of all scanned hosts that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific scanned hosts based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Scanner Appliance
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of available scanner appliances from the user's account on the Qualys cloud.

workflows.name: Get Vulnerability List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of vulnerabilities from KnowledgeBase on the Qualys cloud, based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: PC - Fetch Scan
workflows.description: Downloads all the compliance management scan results from the Qualys cloud, or specific compliance management scan results based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: PC - Get Scan List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of all policy compliance scans that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific policy compliance scans based on the input parameters you have specified.

routes.name: Get PC Scan List -> Save Response

workflows.name: Update Asset
workflows.description: Updates assets, i.e., existing IP addresses, in the subscription on the Qualys cloud, based on the IP addresses and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: VM - Get Scan List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list and details of all vulnerability scans that are present in the user's account on the Qualys cloud, or specific vulnerability scans based on the input parameters you have specified.

routes.name: Get Vulnerability Scan List -> Save Response

workflows.name: VM - Manage Scan
workflows.description: Manages a vulnerability management scan on the Qualys cloud, based on the scan reference and actions you have specified.
